summary: This document consists of four AT&T wireless subscriber information records for account number 422129973, showing Scott Borgerson as the financial liable party and listing several associated users and devices. It appears to be a subpoenaed financial record related to an investigation.

persons.name: Scott Borgerson
persons.context: The primary account holder for AT&T wireless account 422129973, with service since 2004. His email address (sborgerson@mac.com) and a Manchester, MA address are listed.

persons.name: Noah Borgerson
persons.context: Listed as a user (MSISDN) on the AT&T account held by Scott Borgerson, with service starting on September 20, 2019.

persons.name: Scott G Borgerson
persons.context: Listed as a user (MSISDN) on the AT&T account, associated with the address 301 Summer St, Manchester, MA 01944, with service starting July 22, 2007. Shares an email with Scott Borgerson.

connections.description: Scott Borgerson is the financial liable party for the AT&T wireless account on which Noah Borgerson is an authorized user.
Scott Borgerson is the financial liable party for the AT&T wireless account used by Scott G Borgerson. They share an email address, suggesting a close personal or familial connection.

events.title: Records Produced

keyFacts: Scott Borgerson is the financial liable party for AT&T wireless account 422129973, with service dating back to March 2004.
The account has multiple associated users/device lines, including individuals named Noah Borgerson and Scott G Borgerson.
Scott G Borgerson is associated with the address 301 Summer St, Manchester, MA 01944, and shares the email 'sborgerson@mac.com' with the primary account holder.
The document is marked 'CONFIDENTIAL' and 'For use by authorized person only', indicating it was produced for an official investigation, likely by the SDNY (Southern District of New York).
